title: King Ranch Chicken Casserole

ingredients: 1 can (10 3/4 oz) condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 can (10 3/4 oz) condensed cream of chicken soup
1 can (10 oz) ROTEL Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies
12 corn tortillas, torn into bite-sized pieces

steps: In a large saucepan, cook onion in melted margarine until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add soups, ROTEL tomatoes and chicken, stirring until well blended.
In a 13x9x2 inch baking pan, alternately layer tortillas, soup mixture, and cheese, repeating for 3 layers.
Bake 40 minutes or until hot and bubbling.
